welcome.title: Simplify Translation Process with BondMa
welcome.description: A localization management platform designed for development teams, helping you efficiently manage multilingual projects and collaborate seamlessly on translations.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.description: Bondma provides professional localization tools to help teams manage multilingual content more efficiently

0.title: Multilingual Support
0.description: Support multiple languages to meet global needs and achieve seamless localization experience.

1.title: Collaborative Translation
1.description: Team members can participate in translation work simultaneously, improving efficiency and ensuring quality.

2.title: Project Management
2.description: Manage multiple projects on one platform, clearly organizing translation resources for different projects.

3.title: Developer Friendly
3.description: Support various formats for import and export, seamlessly integrating with modern development toolchains.

4.title: Secure and Reliable
4.description: Fine-grained permission control ensures the security of translated content and data privacy.

5.title: Open Source
5.description: Completely open source, community-driven, continuously improving functions and experience.

workflow.title: Simplified Workflow
workflow.description: From importing projects to exporting translations, Bondma provides an end-to-end localization management solution

import.title: Import Project
import.description: Complete the project import process efficiently in a few simple steps

translate.title: Translation Management
translate.description: Complete the translation management process efficiently in a few simple steps

export.title: Export & Integration
export.description: Complete the export and integration process efficiently in a few simple steps

cases.title: User Cases
cases.description: See how other teams use Bondma to improve localization efficiency

case1.title: TechGlobal
case1.subtitle: Localization Challenges for Global Applications
case1.quote: "After using Bondma, we increased our translation efficiency by 60%, now we can support 20 languages simultaneously without expanding the team."

case2.title: CreativeStudio
case2.subtitle: Consistent Management of Multi-platform Content
case2.quote: "Bondma helps us maintain the consistency of brand information across multiple platforms, reducing translation errors by 90%."

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Join Bondma now to experience efficient localization management and make your product speak the languages of the world.
cta.note: Free version includes basic features, upgradable anytime

tutorial.pageDescription: This tutorial will help you understand how to use the Bondma platform to efficiently manage multilingual translation projects, from basic features to advanced configurations.
tutorial.helpDescription: If you have other questions or need personalized support, please feel free to contact us.

overview.title: System Overview
overview.description: Bondma is a localization management platform that helps teams collaborate on translations and manage multilingual content.

steps.0: Register an account and log in to the system

quickstart.title: Quick Start
quickstart.description: Basic steps from creating your first project to exporting translations.

steps.0: Create a new project in your team

create.title: Creating and Managing Teams
create.description: Learn how to create and manage teams, set roles and permissions.

steps.0: Create a new team and set team information
steps.1: Invite members to join the team
steps.3: Manage team permissions and access control

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Understand how to efficiently organize team members to work together.

setup.title: Creating and Configuring Projects
setup.description: Learn how to create projects and configure them in detail.

steps.0: Create a new project and set basic information
steps.2: Set up project glossary and style guide
steps.3: Configure project workflow and review process

importExport.title: Importing and Exporting Files
importExport.description: Learn about supported file formats and data exchange methods.

steps.0: Supported import file formats (JSON, YAML, CSV, etc.)
steps.1: How to properly import existing translations

interface.title: Translation Interface
interface.description: Learn how to use the translation editor to efficiently complete translations.

quality.title: Translation Quality Management
quality.description: Learn how to ensure translation quality and consistency.

steps.0: Set up and use quality check rules

api.title: API Integration
api.description: How to use Bondma API to implement automated workflows.

steps.1: Common API endpoints and use cases

customize.title: Customization and Extension
customize.description: Customize the Bondma platform according to your needs.

steps.2: Advanced data import and export options

tokenForm.description: Please enter key and translation fields

tokenTable.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The translation data will be permanently removed.

import.title: Import Translations
import.description: Import translation data from files to "{projectName}" project
import.fileImportDesc: Supports JSON, CSV, XML, and YAML file formats

dragDropArea.instructions: Click or drag file here to import
dragDropArea.supportedFormats: Supports JSON, CSV, XML, YAML formats

importNotes.title: Import Notes:
importNotes.jsonNote: JSON files should contain valid translation key-value pairs
importNotes.csvNote: CSV files should have headers in the first row, with keys in the first column and values in the second
importNotes.formatNote: Format will be automatically inferred based on file type

export.title: Export Translations
export.settingsDesc: Configure the export format and content
export.noLanguageSelected: No languages selected will export all languages
export.includeEmptyDesc: Include items that have not been translated yet
export.metadataDesc: Include creation time, modifier, and other info
export.fileNote: Each language will be generated as a separate file and packaged as a ZIP
export.exportSuccessDesc: Translation ZIP package has started downloading

overview.documentCountDesc: Total number of documents in this project

settings.description: Manage configurations and options for "{projectName}" project

basic.title: Basic Information
basic.description: Modify basic information and configuration of the project
basic.name: Project Name

languages.title: Language Management
languages.description: Manage supported languages for the project
languages.noLanguages: No languages added, please add at least one language

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Configure advanced features and options for the project

autoTranslate.title: Auto Translate
autoTranslate.description: Automatically translate new content to other languages when added

versioning.title: Version Control
versioning.description: Track content revision history and allow rollbacks

comments.title: Enable Comments
comments.description: Allow team members to comment and discuss translation content

public.title: Public Project
public.description: Allow unauthenticated users to access translation data (read-only)

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.description: Actions in this area cannot be undone, please proceed with caution
danger.warning: Deleting the project will permanently remove all related data, including all translations, history, and settings.
danger.deleteDescription: This action will permanently delete the "{projectName}" project and all its data, and cannot be recovered.
danger.confirmDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
danger.confirmDeleteDescription: This action will permanently delete the "{projectName}" project and all its data, including all translations, history, and project settings. This action cannot be undone.
